name: Mekong Classifieds Pte Ltd
description: Developer of a real estate platform designed to offer property management services. The company's platform offers a new way to find houses, apartments, commercial properties and lands both for sale or rent, enabling people to make hassle-free real estate transactions.
one_liner: Developer of a real estate platform designed to offer property management services. The company's platform offers a new way to find houses, apartments, commercial properties and lands both for sale or rent, enabling people to make hassle-free real estate transactions.
